name: National Treasure: Book Of Parodies
description:
Have you ever wondered what it'd be like to attend a high school that's dedicated to your favorite Actor? Well, look no further!

Join Homie on his high school adventure as he sets out to meet his favorite actor, Nicolas Cage and see if Homie succeeds in persuing him!

CREDITS

Made with Renpy

Music from Youtube Editor

Nicolas Cage played by Nicolas Cage

Homie played by You!

All images are from Google
